title: I3S point cloud scene layer: node
description: A single bounding volume hierarchy node

resourceId.description: Index of the first child of this node. The resourceID must be used to query node resources, like geometry buffer (XYZ)  /nodes/<resourceId>/geometry/0  and attribute buffers. One buffer can have one attribute. Available attributes are declared in the SceneLayer document. /nodes/<resourceId>/attributes/<attrib_key>.

firstChild.description: Index of the first child of this node.

childCount.description: Number of children for this node. Value is 0 if node is a leaf node.

vertexCount.description: Number of points for this node.

lodThreshold.description: Estimation of the area covered by this node. Used to estimate LOD switching based on density.

obb.description: Oriented bounding boxes (OBB) are the only supported bounding volumes.

lodThreshold.description: This metric may be used as a threshold to split a parent node into its children. See [layer.store.index.lodSelectionMetricType](index.md)
